title: [Large-Scale] Science Teacher Competency Enhancement Workshop for Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Secondary Science Curriculum Content and Basic PBL (Project-Based Learning) Design Experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on smartphone-based learning support tools and offline group collaboration activities.

learning_goals: Participants can evaluate learners' interaction patterns by utilizing AI analysis tools when designing PBL lessons.
Participants can compare AI-generated videos (with/without previews) to explain criteria for selecting efficient teaching methods.

Within two weeks, participants will create design plans converting three complex scientific concepts (e.g., quantum superposition, gene expression) from physics/biology into PBL scenarios and achieve an average score of â‰¥4 on a 5-point peer evaluation rubric.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
